SEARCH
Package it.polimi.is23am10.utils.config

Class AppConfig

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.is23am10.utils.config.AppConfig
public final class AppConfig extends Object
The application config class definition. If not set otherwise all the configuration parameters for the application are set to default values here.
